overview: Kyle and Jen, estranged siblings, travel from New York City to rural Pennsylvania to pack up the home of their recently deceased mother. While there, they make a discovery that turns their world upside-down.  A Picture of You is a serious movie about life that gets sideswiped in the supermarket parking lot by a funny movie about death. Itâ€™s a story about family, loss, secrets, letting go, and starting anew.
title: A Picture of You
